Description_lang: General Grashaal curses an enemy, inflicting $s1 Nature damage every $t1 sec for $d. Upon expiration or removal of the curse, all allies within $334616A1 yards are turned to stone, removing all applications of $@spellname333913 and absorbing up to $334616s2 damage for $334616d. While the stone shell holds, the target is Stunned and attackable by allies.
AuraDescription_lang: $s1 Nature damage inflicted every $t1 sec.Upon expiration or removal, $@spellname334616 is triggered.
